string-array.name: standardGOM
string-array.item: You failed. Now you can try again or give up.

string-array.name: GOMReputation
string-array.item: Everybody in the whole world hates you and you decide to kill yourself.

string-array.name: GOMGrade
string-array.item: You got kicked out of school and now this game has no reason to go on.

string-array.name: GOMParents
string-array.item: You disappointed your parents so much that they hated you and kicked out of your home. Now you live on the street. Congrats.

string-array.name: GOMMoney
string-array.item: You have no Money to buy food. So you slowly starve to death.

string-array.name: GOMReputationAndGrade
string-array.item: Everybody on the planet hates you and you got out of school because you suck.

string-array.name: GOMReputationAndParents
string-array.item: Everybody in the whole world hates you (including your parents) and you decide to kill yourself.

string-array.name: GOMReputationAndMoney
string-array.item: Everybody on the planet hates and you got no money to get food.

string-array.name: GOMGradeAndParents
string-array.item: You got kicked out of school and your parents hate you.

string-array.name: GOMGradeAndMoney
string-array.item: You got kicked out of school and you are broke.

string-array.name: GOMParentsAndMoney
string-array.item: You disappointed your parents so much that they hated you and kicked out of your home. Now you live on the street. But you also have no money…

string-array.name: GOMReputationAndGradeAndParents
string-array.item: Everybody on the planet hates you, you got kicked of school because you suck and your parents kicked you out of your home.

string-array.name: GOMReputationAndGradeAndMoney
string-array.item: Everybody on the planet hates you, you got kicked of school because you suck and you have no money anymore.

string-array.name: GOMReputationAndParentsAndMoney
string-array.item: Everybody on the planet hates you, your parents kicked you out of your home and you are broke, but at least you have a good grade.

string-array.name: GOMGradeAndParentsAndMoney
string-array.item: You got kicked out of your school and your home. And because you wasted you money so much, you are broke.

string-array.name: GOMReputationAndGradeAndParentsAndMoney
string-array.item: You successfully failed in your life.

string-array.name: GOMsuiced
string-array.item: You killed yourself and now this game has no reason to go on.
